content.title: My name is Ekaterina.
content.text:
Hey there! I'm a front-end developer who's been diving into code for over 4 years. I'm kinda obsessed with micro animations and the latest tech stuff. It's all about making the web a cooler place, right?

I've had a blast working on media and interactive projects. There's nothing like seeing someone genuinely enjoy something you've built. It's like watching someone enjoy a meal you've cooked, but in the digital world!

I'm currently live in Riga. Such a gorgeous and laid-back city! It's the perfect backdrop for balancing my coding adventures with some quality downtime.

Feel free to poke around my website and see what I'm all about. And hey, if you're thinking we might make a good team for a project, drop me a line!

I'm drawn to projects related to media, those featuring appealing and user-friendly UI/UX designs, and interactive experiences that engage users.

Feel free to get in touch!

experience.stack: React, Typescript, Less, Redux, JavaScript, PHP
Vue.js, JavaScript, JQuery, HTML5, CSS3, SVG, Canvas
